snippet: Rafael Nadal filed suit Monday against a former French minister who accused him of doping, saying he needs to defend his integrity and image as an athlete....
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal filed suit Monday against a former French minister who accused him of doping, saying he needs to defend his integrity and image as an athlete.

headline.print_headline: Nadal Sues Former French Minister Who Accused Him of Doping
headline.main: Nadal Sues Former French Minister Who Accused Him of Doping
